summary: A New York tramp (Jolson) falls in love with the mayor's amnesiac girlfriend after rescuing her from a suicide attempt
cast: Al Jolson|Madge Evans|Frank Morgan|Harry Langdon|Chester Conklin|Tyler Brooke|Tammany Young|Bert Roach|Edgar Connor|Dorothea Wolbert|Louise Carver|Ernie Adams|Vince Barnett|Ted Billings|Heinie Conklin|Gino Corrado|John George|Harold Goodwin|Lorenz Hart|Robert Homans|Lorraine Hubbell|Burr McIntosh|William H. O'Brien|Rita Owin|Victor Potel|Richard Rodgers|Bodil Rosing|Sidney Skolsky|Billy West
title: Soy un vagabundo
